messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Supply Department

Cargo: Seems we've ordered doubles of our department resupply packages this month. Can we send them to you?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We have given you some experimental chemicals in supply, free of charge.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Repeat: We have give you some experimental research chemicals free of charge

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We urge you to try these chemicals, if you would like to keep receiving power from centcom.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Chemistry will not be receiving power from centcom until these chemicals are tested.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Please announce over the radio before testing any of these chemicals.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Transfer Centre.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Its's now illegal to do, make or sell drugs sush as space drugs. It howver is now completly legal to kill clowns and be racist

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: It is now completly legal to defend yourself with leathel force against any and all people who wish to harm  you, random rampages will not be tolirated.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Chemistry.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our sophisticated probabilistic models, we believe that one of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed clown level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.
